Name: BASMENT DWELLERS
About the game: BASMENT DWELLERS is an epic, procedurally generated, next-generation CRPG about killing monsters and stealing their treasure. - Kill monsters, steal their treasure - Upgrade your equipment (weapons and armor will break after a while) - Fight a multitude of dangerous foes like the annoying ROGUE, the insidious BLURK and the terrifying GIANT NOSE - Navigate a complex basment layout (generated anew for each game) with one-way trapdoors and underwater sections (don't forget your scuba gear!) - Sample local cuisine such as MAGGOT PUDDING and MOLD SOUP - Compete for the highest score - Descend into Hell to defeat the ARCHDEMON!
